name: testExplorer.onStart
desc: Retire or reset all test states whenever a test run is started

name: testExplorer.onReload
desc: Retire or reset all test states whenever the test tree is reloaded

name: testExplorer.codeLens
desc: Show a CodeLens above each test or suite for running or debugging the tests

name: testExplorer.gutterDecoration
desc: Show the state of each test in the editor using Gutter Decorations

name: testExplorer.errorDecoration
desc: Show error messages from test failures as decorations in the editor

name: testExplorer.errorDecorationHover
desc: Provide hover messages for the error decorations in the editor

name: testExplorer.sort
desc: Sort the tests and suites by label or location. If this is not set (or set to null), they will be shown in the order that they were received from the adapter

name: testExplorer.showExpandButton
desc: Show a button for expanding the top nodes of the test tree, recursively for the given number of levels

name: testExplorer.showCollapseButton
desc: Show a button for collapsing the nodes of the test tree

name: testExplorer.addToEditorContextMenu
desc: Add menu items to the editor context menu for running and debugging the tests in the current file

name: testExplorer.showOnRun
desc: Switch to the Test Explorer view whenever a test run is started

name: testExplorer.mergeSuites
desc: Merge suites with the same label and parent

name: testExplorer.hideEmptyLog
desc: Hide the output channel used to show a test's log when the user clicks on a test whose log is empty

name: testExplorer.hideWhen
desc: Hide the Test Explorer when no test adapters have been registered or when no tests have been found

name: testExplorer.useNativeTesting
desc: Disable the Test Explorer UI and use VSCode's native Testing UI instead
